body: South Korea's Wikitree posted photos of  the very first sunrise of the year across the country. Annually, thousands of Koreans travel for hours to the far eastern or southern side of the country or climb nearest mountains for Haemaji(Sunrise Greeting), their centruries-old tradition.
original_body: South Korea's Wikitree posted photos of  the very first sunrise of the year across the country. Annually, thousands of Koreans travel for hours to the far eastern or southern side of the country or climb nearest mountains for Haemaji(Sunrise Greeting), their centruries-old tradition.
title: South Korea's Haemaji(Sunrise Greeting) in 2011

sentence: South Korea's Wikitree posted photos of  the very first sunrise of the year across the country.
Annually, thousands of Koreans travel for hours to the far eastern or southern side of the country or climb nearest mountains for Haemaji(Sunrise Greeting), their centruries-old tradition.
